009package HoughTransform;
010
011import java.awt.Color;
012import java.awt.geom.Path2D;
013
014import ij.IJ;
015import ij.ImagePlus;
016import ij.gui.GenericDialog;
017import ij.gui.Overlay;
018import ij.plugin.filter.PlugInFilter;
019import ij.process.ByteProcessor;
020import ij.process.FloatProcessor;
021import ij.process.ImageProcessor;
022import imagingbook.common.hough.HoughTransformLines;
023import imagingbook.common.hough.lines.HoughLine;
024import imagingbook.common.ij.IjUtils;
025import imagingbook.common.ij.overlay.ColoredStroke;
026import imagingbook.common.ij.overlay.ShapeOverlayAdapter;
027
028/** 
029 * This ImageJ plugin demonstrates the use of the {@link HoughTransformLines}
030 * class for detecting straight lines in images.
031 * It expects a binary input image with background = 0 and foreground (contour) 
032 * pixels with values &gt; 0.
033 * A vector overlay is used to display the detected lines.
034 * 
035 * @author W. Burger
036 * @version 2022/04/01
037 */
038public class Hough_Lines_Demo implements PlugInFilter {
039
040        static int MaxLines = 5;                        // number of strongest lines to be found
041        static int MinPointsOnLine = 50;        // min. number of points on each line
042
043        static boolean ShowAccumulator = true;
044        static boolean ShowExtendedAccumulator = false;
045        static boolean ShowAccumulatorPeaks = false;
046        static boolean ListStrongestLines = false;
047        static boolean ShowLines = true;
048        static boolean InvertOriginal = true;
049        
050        static double  LineWidth = 0.5;
051        static Color   LineColor = Color.magenta;
052        
053        static boolean ShowReferencePoint = true;
054        static Color   ReferencePointColor = Color.green;
055
056        ImagePlus im;   
057
058        public int setup(String arg, ImagePlus im) {
059                this.im = im;
060                return DOES_8G + NO_CHANGES;
061        }
062
063        public void run(ImageProcessor ip) {
064                if (!IjUtils.isBinary(ip)) {
065                        IJ.showMessage("Binary (edge) image required!");
066                        return;
067                }
068
069                HoughTransformLines.Parameters params = new HoughTransformLines.Parameters();
070
071                if (!showDialog(params)) //dialog canceled or error
072                        return; 
073
074                // compute the Hough Transform and retrieve the strongest lines:
075                HoughTransformLines ht = new HoughTransformLines((ByteProcessor)ip, params);
076                HoughLine[] lines = ht.getLines(MinPointsOnLine, MaxLines);
077
078                if (lines.length == 0) {
079                        IJ.log("No lines detected - check the input image and parameters!");
080                }
081
082                if (ShowAccumulator){
083                        FloatProcessor accIp = ht.getAccumulatorImage();
084                        (new ImagePlus("Accumulator for " + im.getTitle(), accIp)).show();
085                }
086
087                if (ShowExtendedAccumulator){
088                        FloatProcessor accEx = ht.getAccumulatorImageExtended();
089                        (new ImagePlus("Extended accumulator for " + im.getTitle(), accEx)).show();
090                }
091
092                if (ShowAccumulatorPeaks) {
093                        FloatProcessor maxIp = ht.getAccumulatorMaxImage();
094                        (new ImagePlus("Accumulator maxima for " + im.getTitle(), maxIp)).show();
095                }
096
097                if (ListStrongestLines) {
098                        for (int i = 0; i < lines.length; i++) {
099                                IJ.log(i + ": " + lines[i].toString());
100                        }
101                }
102                
103                if (ShowLines) {
104                        ImageProcessor lineIp = ip.duplicate();
105                        if (InvertOriginal) lineIp.invert();
106                        double lineLength = Math.hypot(ip.getWidth(), ip.getHeight());
107                        
108                        Overlay oly = new Overlay();
109                        ShapeOverlayAdapter ola = new ShapeOverlayAdapter(oly);
110                        ola.setStroke(new ColoredStroke(LineWidth, LineColor));
111                        for (HoughLine hl : lines) {
112                                ola.addShape(hl.getShape(lineLength));
113                        }
114                        
115                        if (ShowReferencePoint) {
116                                ola.setStroke(new ColoredStroke(0.5, ReferencePointColor));
117                                ola.addShape(markPoint(ht.getXref(), ht.getYref()));
118                        }
119
120                        ImagePlus lim = new ImagePlus(im.getShortTitle()+"-lines", lineIp);
121                        lim.setOverlay(oly);
122                        lim.show();
123                }
124        }
125
126        // -----------------------------------------------------------------
127
128        private boolean showDialog(HoughTransformLines.Parameters params) {
129                GenericDialog dlg = new GenericDialog("Hough Transform (lines)");
130                dlg.addNumericField("Axial steps", params.nAng, 0);
131                dlg.addNumericField("Radial steps", params.nRad, 0);
132                dlg.addNumericField("Max. number of lines to show", MaxLines, 0);
133                dlg.addNumericField("Min. number of points per line", MinPointsOnLine, 0);
134                dlg.addCheckbox("Show accumulator", ShowAccumulator);
135                dlg.addCheckbox("Show extended accumulator", ShowExtendedAccumulator);
136                dlg.addCheckbox("Show accumulator peaks", ShowAccumulatorPeaks);
137                dlg.addCheckbox("List strongest lines", ListStrongestLines);
138                dlg.addCheckbox("Show lines", ShowLines);
139                dlg.addNumericField("Line width", LineWidth, 1);
140                dlg.addCheckbox("Show reference point", ShowReferencePoint);
141                
142                dlg.showDialog();
143                if(dlg.wasCanceled())
144                        return false;
145                
146                params.nAng = (int) dlg.getNextNumber();
147                params.nRad = (int) dlg.getNextNumber();
148                MaxLines = (int) dlg.getNextNumber();
149                MinPointsOnLine = (int) dlg.getNextNumber();
150                ShowAccumulator = dlg.getNextBoolean();
151                ShowExtendedAccumulator = dlg.getNextBoolean();
152                ShowAccumulatorPeaks = dlg.getNextBoolean();
153                ListStrongestLines = dlg.getNextBoolean();
154                ShowLines = dlg.getNextBoolean();
155                LineWidth = dlg.getNextNumber();
156                ShowReferencePoint = dlg.getNextBoolean();
157                
158                if(dlg.invalidNumber()) {
159                        IJ.showMessage("Error", "Invalid input number");
160                        return false;
161                }
162                return true;
163        }
164        
165        private Path2D markPoint(double xc, double yc) {
166                double markerSize = 2.0;
167                Path2D path = new Path2D.Double();
168                path.moveTo(xc - markerSize, yc);
169                path.lineTo(xc + markerSize, yc);
170                path.moveTo(xc, yc - markerSize);
171                path.lineTo(xc, yc + markerSize);
172                return path;
173        }
174
175}
